name: Survive: eat or be eaten
description:
Survive Eat or Be Eaten

Consume the weak and avoid the strong to survive.

let me know the highest level you reach in the comments below!

Instructions
  • Click on the game to start
  • Press z on the title screen to play
  • Use arrow keys to move
  • Eat things smaller than you and avoid the bigger ones
  • Press z for a little speed boost
Checkout the source code

https://github.com/jondkoon/amoeba
